{{Wireless embedded system |brand=NEC |model=WR8700N-HP |revision= |upc= |ean=4548835555037 |asin=B0037TSAM6;JP; |price= |est_release_date=01/2010 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=Japan |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=Japan only |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel, reverse gender core |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7161 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=25X32VFIG |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT46V16M16-5B K |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9220 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9223 |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8316 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=WARPSTAR-XXXXXX-G,WARPSTAR-XXXXXX-A |default_ssid_regex=^WARPSTAR-[A-F0-9]{6}-G$,,,^WARPSTAR-[A-F0-9]{6}-A$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:18:8B |oui_eth=00:18:8B }} "(E)GAIL" and "A61-000767-002" is on the top of the board. :"MDK 228V-0" and "2010.01.18" is on the bottom of the board.
'''NEC''' is presumed to manufacture this device.
This device is using... *an '''Atheros''' AR7161-BC1A (SoC) *an '''Atheros''' AR9220-AL1A (5GHz radio) **w/ 2x [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=956 '''Skyworks''' ('''SiGe''') SE2595L DB 802.11n FEMs] *an '''Atheros''' AR9223-AL1A (2.4GHz radio) **w/ 2x [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=956 '''Skyworks''' ('''SiGe''') SE2595L DB 802.11n FEMs] *an '''Atheros''' AR8316-AK1E (GbE Switch)
The default SSID formats for the devices seem to be '''WARPSTAR-XXXXXX-G''' and '''WARPSTAR-XXXXXX-A''', where '''XXXXXX''' some hex number (upper case letters). :'''WARPSTAR-XXXXXX-GW''' (which seems to be a WEP128 VAP) may also be used by default, dunno.
P/N: PA-WR8700N-HP
